text: Need Brooklyn Edwards for Mad Mex campaign. Budget arnd $7,297, looking for 2 x Instagram post, 1 x 90-second product demo, 3 x 30-second Instagram reel, 1 x Instagram post, 2 x Podcast guest. 9 week exclus from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 12 months. Engagement period: 2 months.
